name: linkedin-jobs-mcp-server
title: LinkedIn Jobs MCP Server - AI Job Search
description: MCP server that enables AI agents like Claude to search jobs on LinkedIn and 50+ other job boards. Works with Claude Desktop, VS Code, and any MCP-compatible client.

seo.title: LinkedIn Jobs MCP Server - Connect AI to Job Boards
seo.description: Enable AI agents to search 50+ job boards including LinkedIn, Indeed, Glassdoor. Perfect for Claude, ChatGPT, and custom AI applications.
